name: Star Spawn - To the MAX!
description: Critical Hit Table for the Star Spawn

results.text: Bend the knee! Through sheer mind power, the Star Spawn makes their enemy kneel before them, gaining the upper hand and dealing an additional melee strike.
Eardrums smashed. The target's eardrums rupture from the intense Manifestation, causing them to become permanently deaf.
Bloody tears. The Manifestation was too strong, dealing an additional [[1D6]] damage and causing the target to begin crying blood.
Freaky Friday! Along with the Manifestation, the consciousness of two separate targets switch bodies for [[1D4]] turns.
Weak wills make easy targets. In addition to the Manifestation, the Star Spawn causes a target they can see to receive -2 to all their rolls for the next [[1D4]] turns.
Super Rad energy leaks out of the Star Spawn's mind and finds its way to any target. This Radness grants the target an additional [[1D6]] to their next roll.
Domination will be easy! An enemy the Star Spawn can see deals damage to a target within range of them.
Explosive feedback. The last damage dealt to the Star Spawn is retroactively dealt back to the target that hit 'em. The Manifestation goes off without a hitch, too.

Advice from the cosmos. The Manifestation acts as a beacon to some distant hive mind who, collectively, sends back some insight to the Star Spawn gaining a pool of 3D6. These dice can be rolled to aid any rolls the Star Spawn wishes. This insight lasts until the Star Spawn's next long rest.
Such a puny brain! The Star Spawn takes over any target that they can see next turn. This can also be an Ally.
Lazer eyes! Every psychic needs to shoot lazers out of their eyes, right? The Star Spawn deals [[1D6]] damage to a target they can see. (Obviously.)

Humanoids are such easy prey. The Manifestation deals [[1D6]] additional damage to the target and the same amount to another target Humanoid. On a failed Resolve Saving Throw, the new target takes the full damage, and half on a success.
Nullify! The next action that targets the Star Spawn is negated. Their would-be Attacker stands and drools instead.
The Flesh is weaker than the mind! The Manifestation causes the target to mutate! Roll on the Major Mutation table and deal an additional [[1D6]] damage.

I like to watch you suffer! The Star Spawn forces a target they can see to deal damage to themselves with whatever weapon they are wielding. The target can be the same one the Manifestation is initially targeting.
Do what THEY say! The Star Spawn's mental prowess is too powerful for their foe, giving them complete mind domination for [[1D4]]+Star Spawn Level of turns.

Mind Bullets!! A side effect of the successful Manifestation! It's as if you are holding a Mac-Daddy in your Xeno grip, spitting ammo at a target within range, auto-hitting and dealing [[3D6]] damage.
Rewind time. The Manifestation rips a hole in the time space continuum enabling the Star Spawn to take an additional entire turn. (movement and action)
MIND SLAVE! Complete mind domination of a target until the Star Spawn or target dies.
Extreme cephalic destruction! Each enemy within 10ft of the Star Spawn must make a Saving Throw vs Death. On a failed save, their heads explode, spreading gray matter everywhere.
